HooverCompareSegmentation
Compare two segmentations with Hoover metrics
Segmentation
QgsProcessingParameterRasterLayer|ingt|Input ground truth|None|False
QgsProcessingParameterRasterLayer|inms|Input machine segmentation|None|False
QgsProcessingParameterNumber|bg|Background label|QgsProcessingParameterNumber.Integer|0|True
QgsProcessingParameterNumber|th|Overlapping threshold|QgsProcessingParameterNumber.Double|0.75|True
QgsProcessingParameterRasterDestination|outgt|Colored ground truth output|None|True
QgsProcessingParameterRasterDestination|outms|Colored machine segmentation output|None|True
